SoftwareType.Name: Internet Connection
SoftwareType.Description: Use this to connect your Computer/Mobile Device to the internet

Feature.Name: Wired Router
Feature.Description: This is how you connect to the internet, but it has to be plugged in to your device.

Feature.Name: Wireless Router
Feature.Description: This a better way to connect to the internet. This way multiple users can connect to the same router, and it doesn't even have a cord.
